full_summary:
### Elevator Replacement - Canadian Coast Guard College - Request for Proposal

#### Important Dates

*   Publication Date: 2023-09-05
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-26T14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-10-16

#### Project Overview

The removal of the existing passenger elevator located in the Cabot Building of the Canadian Coast Guard College in Sydney, Nova Scotia, is a project under this contract. The project also comprises the supply and installation of a new elevator in the same elevator shaft and includes upgrades to structural, mechanical, electrical, and architectural finishes.

#### Award Process

This opportunity is only for the contractor previously invited through the pre-qualification process. All inquiries regarding technical matters and contractual questions should be addressed to the contracting authority, Richard Parsons at richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tenders Submitting Requirements

*   Tahsildars interested in responding to this project must submit their tenders electronically to [insert e-mail] by the tender closing date.
*   Only electronic submissions will be considered, exceptions under which they will be accepted.
*   All tenders must be supported by a non-refundable bid deposit equal to 5% of the tender amount and must be paid by certified bank draft.

#### Requirements for Eligibility

*   Contractor must have relevant experience in replacement of elevators with supplies, installation, and maintenance.
*   Details of previous projects and positive references from previous clientele must also be included.



This Government Tender announcement was issued on the basis of various amendments whose details are not provided due to the amendment restrictions.  The details of the amendment history and amendment impact on project timeline must be clarified prior to Respondent Assembly submission. All proposals and drawing must be written in both English & French languages.

Sincerely,
PWGSC site server
